segments.text: I see the girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking his neck for those cookies, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and he’s barely holding on, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just focused on getting her treat, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the boy if he falls, but I also want to laugh at how ridiculous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and they’re going to get in so much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
